author: John Kennedy
message: Let us resolve to be masters, not the victims, of our history, controlling our own destiny without giving way to blind suspicions and emotions.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marie Curie
message: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anne Frank
message: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a persons character lies in their own hands.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Adversity isn't set against you to fail; adversity is a way to build your character so that you can succeed over and over again through perseverance.
title: Thought of the day
